update dropshiporder set pay_price = round(product_cost + foreign_freight +'',2) ,pay_price_tow = foreign_freight, state = 5 ,orderpaytime = now() where parent_order_no= #{orderno};
mapper.select: select oi.state,oi.orderid,oi.parent_order_no,oi.child_order_no,oi.product_cost,od.goodsid,od.delivery_time,od.yourorder,od.goodsname,od.goodsprice,od.orderid,car_url,od.car_img,od.remark,od.goodsfreight, purchase_state,oi.foreign_freight,oi.currency,discount_amount,order_ac,car_type,service_fee,cashback,oi.extra_freight from dropshiporder oi,order_details od where oi.child_order_no=#{orderNo} and od.state!=2 and od.dropshipid=oi.child_order_no and oi.user_id=#{userId} order by od.car_url
select pay_price,currency,cashback from dropshiporder where child_order_no= #{orderNo} limit 1

select dso.*,sp.expressno from dropshiporder dso left join shipping_package sp on dso.child_order_no = sp.orderid where dso.user_id = #{userId} and dso.child_order_no IN (SELECT child_order_no FROM dropshiporder where parent_order_no = #{parentOrderNo})
